title: Recruiting
job_overview:
We’re The Paul Group, a leading final expense agency partnered with Lincoln Heritage. We're looking for a reliable virtual recruiter outside the U.S. to help us source and connect with licensed life insurance agents.
Tasks include uploading data into our CRM, calling or texting prospects, and scheduling phone interviews with our U.S.-based managers.
Must speak fluent English and have experience with sales or insurance recruiting. Knowledge of tools like GoHighLevel, Excel, or PowerDialer is a plus.
